DOC.brief_summary: This study plan learn alcohol metabolite , acetate , affect brain decision making . Investigators also want learn bacteria gut , know gut microbiome , affect alcohol acetate change brain decision making .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Acetate , Alcohol , Gut Microbiome Brain Function
DOC.detailed_description: This study plan learn alcohol metabolite , acetate , affect brain decision making . Investigators also want learn bacteria gut , know gut microbiome , affect alcohol acetate change brain decision making .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects age 2140 , 2 . Subjects proficient English , 3 . Subjects understand nature study , 4 . Subjects sign informed consent , 5 . Subjects nonsmoking ( define few 20 cigarette lifetime ) , 6 . Subjects moderate drinker ( male:114 drink per week ; female : 17 drink per week ) . 1 . Subjects history dependence drug , nicotine alcohol , 2 . Subjects `` facial flushing '' response alcohol , 3 . Subjects least two drink one hour , 4 . Subjects pregnant nursing , 5 . Subjects major medical problem include diabetes , high blood pressure ( > 150/90 ) , prior neurological psychiatric history ( schizophrenia , bipolar , current major depressive disorder ) , 6 . Subjects tell diagnose liver kidney disease , 7 . Subjects chronic gastrointestinal disease , 8 . Subjects obese ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) , 9 . Subjects take psychoactive medication , steroid nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication , 10 . Subjects use antibiotic within last 6 month , 11 . Subjects prior head trauma result loss consciousness > 15 minute , 12 . Subjects Magnetic Resonance ( MR ) exclusion include claustrophobia , intracranial , orbital , spinal metal implant , pacemaker , cochlear implant , cardiac stent nonMRcompatible implant device .
